NEWCHUGGING Consuming a potion or biscuit grants 50% of its health and/or mana restoration immediately but prevents that consumable from being used again until the effect ends. Health/mana per tick is then reduced by half for the effect's regular duration. And thus the god declared u shall not die from ignite burn
Finally, Akali actually feels more balanced now.
